description: Persistent task queue - survives between sessions. Tasks filed here WILL get done.

tasks.request: Build durable task queue system for persistent work tracking
tasks.result_summary: Built complete task queue system: created queue.json, updated SOUL.md (task persistence rules), HEARTBEAT.md (queue worker + briefing integration), AGENTS.md (session startup + references), created TASK-QUEUE.md documentation
tasks.notes: System now operational - tasks persist across sessions and get worked via heartbeat
